content:
To add a second query to the document, please follow the steps below:Under the Data section click Edit2. In the Query Panel, go to the drop-down arrow next to Add Query.
3. Select the Universe option from the drop down menu.
5. Choose a Universe from the list provided
6. Click OK
7. The new Query will appear in a new tab in the Query Panel.
title: Apricot Results: Adding a New Query
